section.title: Download the latest integration build
section.para:
You can download the latest integration build for the next Eclipse release under the following URL:
Eclipse developer builds
.
This is sometimes necessary to test the latest features or to test a build which is later promoted to M or RC build by the Eclipse platform team.

note.para:
For several Eclipse projects you can also use the Eclipse installer. See
for a small description. At the time of this writing the installer does not work well for platform contributions hence is not the preferred way for contributing to it.

section.title: Install the Git tooling into the Eclipse IDE
section.para: After you downloaded a recent build for the Eclipse IDE, you need to install a few more plug-ins, most notable the Eclipse Git tooling.
